name: 進行管理
text:
ありがとうございました白瀬さん
すみません、長くお待たせしちゃって
trans:
Thank you for your patience, Shirase-san.
I apologize that you're having to wait so long.

name: 咲耶
text:
いえ、そんな
順番ですから
trans:
Oh, there's no need.
Since I was last in line, it's only natural.

name: 咲耶
text:
ふたりの撮影を見学することもできて
とても有意義でしたし
trans:
Plus, I was able to watch the previous two shoots
to help me think of some ideas for my own, so it's
actually been quite useful.

name: 進行管理
text:
ああ！
田中さんも三峰さんもお綺麗でしたよね……！
trans:
Oh, yes! Tanaka-san and Mitsumine-san both looked
gorgeous, didn't they...!

name: 進行管理
text: 白瀬さんも凛とした雰囲気が素敵で！
trans: And Shirase-san, you look just sublime!

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ
ありがとうございます
trans:
Hehe.
Thank you very much.

name: 進行管理
text:
長時間、お疲れ様でした
またよろしくお願いしますね！
trans:
Thank you for working so late.
We would be honored to work with you again!

name: 咲耶
text:
はい
ありがとうございます
trans:
I would as well.
Thank you very much.

name: 咲耶
text: 失礼します
trans: I'll be heading out, then.

name: スタッフ１
text: 白瀬さん、お疲れ様でしたー
trans: Have a good night, Shirase-san.

name: 咲耶
text: お疲れ様でした
trans: I wish you the same.

name: スタッフ２
text: お気をつけて！
trans: Take care on your way home!

name: 咲耶
text: ありがとうございます
trans: Thank you very much.

name: 結華
text:
さくやんファン待望の花婿姿なわけじゃん？
ツイスタ用にじゃんじゃん撮らせてね？
trans:
All your fans have been dreaming of seeing you as a
groom, Sakuyan! So you'll let me takes lotsa pics
to post on Twesta, right?

name: 咲耶
text: 私はかまわないけれど、結華の写真は？
trans:
I don't mind at all, but what about taking photos of
yourself, Yuika?

name: 結華
text:
それもまぁ撮るけど、
さくやんがまみみんエスコートしてるやつとかさぁ！
trans:
I'll take some of those too.
But like, I gotta make sure to take one of you
escorting Mamimin, stuff like that!

name: 摩美々
text:
ちょっとカメラマンさんー
圧が強いんですケドー
trans:
Easy there, cameraman.
You're acting kinda pushy.

name: 結華
text: だって需要は満たしていかなきゃじゃん……！
trans: But like, you gotta meet that fan demand, right...!

name: 摩美々
text: 狙いすぎるのはちょっとー
trans: I don't wanna pander.

name: 結華
text: そこはいい具合にやるって！
trans: But this is such a great fan service opportunity!

name: 摩美々
text: どうだかねー
trans: Dunno about that one...

name: 進行管理
text:
──あ！
みなさん、おはようございます！
trans:
──Oh! 
A warm welcome to you all.

name: 結華
text:
おはようございまーす！
よろしくお願いしまーす！
trans:
Hello!
Let's make this shoot great!

name: 摩美々
text: お願いしまぁす
trans: Let's do this.

name: 咲耶
text: ──よろしくお願いします！
trans: ──It's a pleasure to be working with you!

name: 咲耶
text: ……静かだなぁ
trans: ...It's so much quieter now.

name: 咲耶
text: ──フフッ……
trans: ──Hehe...

name: 摩美々＆結華
text: ダーリーン
trans: Daaarliiing.

name: 咲耶
text:
え……
摩美々？　結華──
trans:
Eh...
Mamimi? Yuika──

name: 結華
text: お疲れ様～
trans: Good evening～

name: 摩美々
text: 優等生進行で偉いじゃーん
trans: What a good girl, arriving just on time.

name: 咲耶
text: え、えぇと……？
trans: Uh, ummm...?

name: 結華
text:
いやー、三峰この後暇でさぁ
ご飯でもどうかと思って
trans:
Oh, you know, I was free after the shoot, and
thought I might go out for dinner.

name: 結華
text: で、誘ったらまみみんが乗ってくれて
trans: And when I invited Mamimin, she agreed to come along.

name: 摩美々
text: 待ち伏せされて誘われちゃねー
trans: She ambushed me, more like.

name: 摩美々
text: 乗ってあげないと可哀想っていうかぁ
trans:
I just played along cuz it'd be kinda sad if Mitsumine
had to go all alone.

name: 結華
text: ああん、意地悪～！
trans: Uwaaah, I'm being bullied～!

name: 摩美々
text: だから咲耶も乗るようにー
trans: So anyway, you should come too, Sakuya.

name: 摩美々
text:
……あとちょっと遅かったら 
帰ろうかと思ってたケド
trans:
...If you'd kept us waiting much longer, I was just
gonna go home, though.

name: 摩美々
text:
まぁ、間に合ったんで 
付き合ってー
trans:
But hey, you made it.
So, come with?

name: 結華
text: まみみんってば素直じゃないなぁ
trans: Always saying one thing and doing another, Mamimin.

name: 結華
text:
たとえ問題児進行で遅かったとしても
ちゃんと待ってたくせに～
trans:
We all know that even if Sakuyan was a naughty girl
and arrived way late, you totally would've waited～

name: 摩美々
text: ……や、帰ってたしー
trans: ...No, I wouldn't have.

name: 結華
text: まぁほら？
trans: But, yeah?

name: 結華
text:
ダーリンはハニーが恋しくなるんじゃないかと
思ってね？
trans:
We were wondering if our darling might have been...
Missing her honeys?

name: 摩美々
trans: Mhm.

name: 咲耶
text:
……ああ……
私のハニーたちは頼もしいな……──！
trans:
...I really was...
My honeys are certainly dependable...!

name: 結華
text: でしょ！
trans: Aren't we!

name: 摩美々
text:
……まぁ
競争率の高いダーリンを射止めてるハニーなんでー
trans:
...Well.
We've gotta be, when we're trying to win the heart
of a darling that's in such high demand.

name: 咲耶
text: フフッ……！
trans: Hehe...!

name: 咲耶
text:
それなら──そんな魅力的なハニーたちを
ぜひお店までエスコートさせてほしい
trans:
In that case──I'd love it if my lovely honeys allowed
me to escort them to the restaurant.

name: 結華
text: やったね、よろしくー！
trans: Wahoo, let's go!

name: 摩美々
text: んー
trans: Mmm.

name: 咲耶
text:
──では
お手をどうぞ、ハニーたち
trans:
──Well, without further ado.
Please do take my arms, honeys.

name: 摩美々＆結華
trans:
Mamimi: Fufu.
Yuika: Okay, my adorable darling!
